The perfect partner app to our desktop application, the new Calendly app lets you bring the power of scheduling with you on-the-go.

You can quickly copy your scheduling links and paste them into an email, text, or any other app, saving you time while you’re away from your computer. Utilizing iOS’ native sharing capabilities, you can quickly populate your scheduling link and a brief message without ever needing to leave the Calendly app.

With the ability to view upcoming meeting details, you can feel more prepared throughout the day, wherever it may take you. View answers to your invitee questions, look up a phone number and even join video calls directly from the app. 

You also have the flexibility to reschedule or cancel upcoming meetings to better accommodate your day or your invitee's. 

Go about your day with confidence knowing that you have the power of Calendly right in your pocket!
